name: Twitter Proportional Kana
description: Let Twitter use Proportional Kana, Proportional CJK Punctuation Marks and All Hiragino Family Fonts for both Chinese and Japanese.
additional_info: Please Be Advised that if you see this looks abnormal in Safari or any Webkit browser, it's definitely not my CSS's fault. It's just that those Webkit staff members in Apple do never give a bug a fuck but just make reasons to treat them as 'intended'.
